item.title: Note: 1017
item.description: dependent type over a type $P$ be a dependent type over $A$, $Q$ be a dependent type over $P$ $Q(a,u)$ is a type for every $a:A$ and $u:P(a)$ a dependent type is a map of a type into a universe dependent products terms of $\prod (a:A), P(a)$ := sections of $P$ := functions from a term of $A$ to a term of type $P(a)$. each judgement defines a term: $a:A \vdash g(a):P(a)$ defines $\lambda a.
